casebody.data:
In the Matter of A.A.W., Minor Child. appealed by Mother. No. 29P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Charlotte Blake, Boone, for Mother, Victoria West. Stephen M. Schoeberle, for Burke County DSS. Mary R. McKay, Attorney-Advocate, for Guardian ad Litem. M. Alan LeCroy, Morganton, for Foster Parents.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 23rd day of January 2007 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd day of May 2007."
